targets.rawSql:
select nd.deployment_type,
count(nd.deployment_type) as "Value"
from node_details nd join organizations o on o.organization_id = nd.organization_id
join cluster_details cd on cd.node_id = nd.node_id
where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
cd.cluster_name in (select cluster_name from cluster_details where cluster_name in ($ClusterName)) and 
nd.host_name in (select host_name from node_details where host_name in ($HostName))
group by nd.deployment_type

panels.title: Node Distribution based on Deployment Type

targets.rawSql:
with t as (
	select 
		split_part(nd.timezone, '/', 1) as "Continent", 
		split_part(nd.timezone, '/', 2) as "City",
		o.organization_name,
		cd.cluster_name, 
		nd.host_name 
	from node_details nd join organizations o on o.organization_id = nd.organization_id 
	join cluster_details cd on cd.node_id = nd.node_id
)
	select count(cc.city_name), cc.city_name, cc.latitude, cc.longitude from t join city_coordinates cc on (t."City" = cc.city_name)
	where 
  		t.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
  		t.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
  		t.host_name in ($HostName)
	group by cc.city_name, cc.latitude, cc.longitude

select cd.cluster_name, count(cd.cluster_name) as "Value" from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id 
join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
nd.host_name in ($HostName)
group by cd.cluster_name

with t as (
	select 
		split_part(cd.upgrade_schedule_timezone, '/', 1) as "Continent", 
		split_part(cd.upgrade_schedule_timezone, '/', 2) as "City",
		o.organization_name,
		cd.cluster_name, 
		nd.host_name 
	from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id 
	join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
)
	select count(cc.city_name), cc.city_name, cc.latitude, cc.longitude from t join city_coordinates cc on (t."Continent" = cc.continent_name and t."City" = cc.city_name)
	where 
  		t.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
  		t.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
  		t.host_name in ($HostName)
	group by cc.city_name, cc.latitude, cc.longitude

panels.title: Cluster Locations based on Upgrade Timezone (if you do not see your cluster here, add it to the city_coordinates.sql file in conf)

targets.rawSql:
select 
nd.host_name as "Host Name",
case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%monday%') then true else false end as "Monday",
case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%tuesday%') then true else false end as "Tuesday",
case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%wednesday%') then true else false end as "Wednesday",
case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%thursday%') then true else false end as "Thursday",
case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%friday%') then true else false end as "Friday",
case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%saturday%') then true else false end as "Saturday",
case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%sunday%') then true else false end as "Sunday"
from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id
join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
where 
  organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
  cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
  nd.host_name in ($HostName)

create or replace function count_business_days(from_date date, to_date date)
returns bigint
as $fbd$
    select count(d::date) as d
    from generate_series(from_date, to_date, '1 day'::interval) d
    where extract('dow' from d) not in (0, 6) 
$fbd$ language sql;

select cd.organization_id as "Organization ID", cd.cluster_name as "Cluster Name", nd.host_name as "Host Name", cd.upgrade_pending as "Upgrade Pending", cd.next_upgrade_time as "Next Upgrade Time"  from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id 
join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
where 
  organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
  cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
  host_name in ($HostName) and
  cd.upgrade_pending = 'true'
  -- count_business_days(DATE(cd.next_upgrade_time), DATE(now()))  >= 2
order by next_upgrade_time

select 
  nd.host_name as "Host name or IP",
  cd.next_upgrade_time as "Next Upgrade Time"
from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id 
join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
where 
  organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
  cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
  nd.host_name in ($HostName)
order by cd.next_upgrade_time

select cd.upgrade_schedule_timezone, count(cd.upgrade_schedule_timezone) as "Value" from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id 
join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
nd.host_name in ($HostName)
group by cd.upgrade_schedule_timezone

select release_channel, count(cd.release_channel) as "Value" from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id 
join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
nd.host_name in ($HostName)
group by cd.release_channel

select t."Day", t."Value" from (
	(
		select 'Monday' as "Day",
		sum(case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%monday%') then 1 else 0 end) as "Value"
		from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id
		join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
		where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
		cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
		nd.host_name in ($HostName)
	) union 
	(
		select 'Tuesday' as "Day",
		sum(case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%tuesday%') then 1 else 0 end) as "Value"
		from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id
		join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
		where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
		cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
		nd.host_name in ($HostName)
	) union
	(
		select 'Wednesday' as "Day",
		sum(case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%wednesday%') then 1 else 0 end) as "Value"
		from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id
		join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
		where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
		cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
		nd.host_name in ($HostName)
	) union
	(
		select 'Thursday' as "Day",
		sum(case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%thursday%') then 1 else 0 end) as "Value"
		from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id
		join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
		where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
		cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
		nd.host_name in ($HostName)
	) union
	(
		select 'Friday' as "Day",
		sum(case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%friday%') then 1 else 0 end) as "Value"
		from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id
		join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
		where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
		cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
		nd.host_name in ($HostName)
	) union
	(
		select 'Saturday' as "Day",
		sum(case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%saturday%') then 1 else 0 end) as "Value"
		from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id
		join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
		where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
		cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
		nd.host_name in ($HostName)
	) union
	(
		select 'Sunday' as "Day",
		sum(case when cd.upgrade_schedule_days like ('%sunday%') then 1 else 0 end) as "Value"
		from cluster_details cd join organizations o on o.organization_id = cd.organization_id
		join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
		where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
		cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
		nd.host_name in ($HostName)
	)
)  t

select cd.last_updated_timestamp as "Last Updated Timestamp", cd.organization_id as "Organization ID", cd.cluster_id as "Cluster ID", cd.cluster_name as "Cluster Name", cd.node_id as "Node ID", nd.host_name as "Host Name", nd.deployment_type as "Deployment Type", 
nd.country_code as "Country Code", nd.city as "City", nd.timezone as "Timezone", cd.release_channel as "Release Channel", cd.upgrade_schedule_days as "Upgrade Schedule Days", TO_CHAR(cd.upgrade_schedule_time, 'HH12:MI:SS') as "Upgrade Schedule Time", cd.upgrade_schedule_timezone as "Upgrade Schedule Timezone"
from cluster_details cd join node_details nd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
where cd.organization_id in (select organization_id from organizations where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')) and
cd.cluster_name in (select cluster_name from cluster_details where cluster_name in ($ClusterName)) and
nd.host_name in (select host_name from node_details where host_name in ($HostName))

list.definition: select distinct organization_name from organizations o
list.label: Select Organization Name
list.name: OrganizationName
list.query: select distinct organization_name from organizations o

list.definition:
select distinct cluster_name from cluster_details cd join organizations o on cd.organization_id = o.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')
list.label: Select Cluster Name
list.name: ClusterName
list.query:
select distinct cluster_name from cluster_details cd join organizations o on cd.organization_id = o.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')

list.definition:
select distinct host_name from node_details nd join organizations o on nd.organization_id = o.organization_id 
join cluster_details cd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName)
list.label: Select Host Name
list.name: HostName
list.query:
select distinct host_name from node_details nd join organizations o on nd.organization_id = o.organization_id 
join cluster_details cd on nd.node_id = cd.node_id
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and cd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName)
